Name: haunt
About the game: You are going to explore an Asian countryside ghost spot where is rumored that spooky secret is hiding. This place will never gives you any rest. When sinister existing chases you, run and hide is your only option. Get out alive and find out what really happened here. [What kind of a game] haunt is not a novel like horror. There is little action. In order to maintain your exciting experience, difficulty have been set little high.(no choice) Little low poly graphic and really dark lighting incite your terror. This is really short casual game so don't worry the time. [Included] ・Jump Scare ・Pounding Action [Not Included] ・Gore Scene ・Disturbing Depiction [Game Broadcast] Welcome. Any kind of approval is no needed.
